memberdef.name: STEP
memberdef.initializer: for (k = 0; k <= 39; k++) { \ dpp[k] = GSM_MULT_R( BP, dp[k - Nc]); \ e[k] = GSM_SUB( d[k], dpp[k] ); \ }
